confirmed_facts: Hong Kong firefighter Ho Wai Hau (ä½•å‰è±ª, 37) died during a fire at Wang Fuk Court on 26 November 2025.
He was the first responder and had been on duty since 3:01â€¯pm, lost contact at 3:30â€¯pm, and was found burned and died at 4:45â€¯pm.
He was engaged to his girlfriend and was scheduled to marry next month.
His girlfriend posted on social media that he was her â€˜superheroâ€™ who had gone to Krypton.

timeline.event: Fire at Wang Fuk Court; Ho Wai Hau arrives, begins search, loses contact, later found burned.
Ho Wai Hau dies after being transported to hospital.
Hong Kong Fire Services website turned grayscale; media reports; girlfriend posts tribute.
